PaladinSpells.Name: Bless
PaladinSpells.Description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

PaladinSpells.Name: Command
PaladinSpells.Description: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn.

PaladinSpells.Name: Cure Wounds
PaladinSpells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

PaladinSpells.Name: Detect Evil and Good
PaladinSpells.Description: For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located.

PaladinSpells.Name: Detect Magic
PaladinSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

PaladinSpells.Name: Detect Poison and Disease
PaladinSpells.Description: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you.

PaladinSpells.Name: Divine Favor
PaladinSpells.Description: Your prayer empowers you with divine radiance. Until the spell ends, your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage on a hit.

PaladinSpells.Name: Heroism
PaladinSpells.Description: A willing creature you touch is imbued with bravery. Until the spell ends, the creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hit points at the start of each of its turns.

PaladinSpells.Name: Protection from Evil and Good
PaladinSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures: aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.

PaladinSpells.Name: Purify Food and Drink
PaladinSpells.Description: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

PaladinSpells.Name: Searing Smite
PaladinSpells.Description: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during the spell's duration, your weapon flares with white-hot intensity, and the attack deals an extra 1d6 fire damage.

PaladinSpells.Name: Shield of Faith
PaladinSpells.Description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

PaladinSpells.Name: Thunderous Smite
PaladinSpells.Description: The first time you hit with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon rings with thunder that is audible within 300 feet of you, and the attack deals an extra 2d6 thunder damage to the target.

PaladinSpells.Name: Wrathful Smite
PaladinSpells.Description: The next time you hit with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your attack deals an extra 1d6 psychic damage. Additionally, if the target is a creature, it must make a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of you until the spell ends.

PaladinSpells.Name: Aid
PaladinSpells.Description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

PaladinSpells.Name: Branding Smite
PaladinSpells.Description: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack before this spell ends, the weapon gleams with astral radiance as you strike.

PaladinSpells.Name: Find Steed
PaladinSpells.Description: You summon a loyal steed that serves you as a mount, allowing you to travel at a fast pace.

PaladinSpells.Name: Lesser Restoration
PaladinSpells.Description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

PaladinSpells.Name: Locate Object
PaladinSpells.Description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

PaladinSpells.Name: Magic Weapon
PaladinSpells.Description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

PaladinSpells.Name: Protection from Poison
PaladinSpells.Description: You touch a creature. If it is poisoned, you neutralize the poison.

PaladinSpells.Name: Zone of Truth
PaladinSpells.Description: You create a magical zone that guards against deception in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range.

PaladinSpells.Name: Aura of Vitality
PaladinSpells.Description: Healing energy radiates from you in an aura with a 30-foot radius. Until the spell ends, the aura moves with you, centered on you. You can use a bonus action to cause one creature in the aura (including you) to regain 2d6 hit points.

PaladinSpells.Name: Blinding Smite
PaladinSpells.Description: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during the spell's duration, your weapon flares with a bright light, and the attack deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage.

PaladinSpells.Name: Create Food and Water
PaladinSpells.Description: You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers within range, enough to sustain up to fifteen humanoids or five steeds for 24 hours.

PaladinSpells.Name: Crusader's Mantle
PaladinSpells.Description: Holy power radiates from you in an aura with a 30-foot radius, awakening boldness in friendly creatures. The aura moves with you, centered on you.

PaladinSpells.Name: Daylight
PaladinSpells.Description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

PaladinSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
PaladinSpells.Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends.

PaladinSpells.Name: Elemental Weapon
PaladinSpells.Description: A nonmagical weapon you touch becomes a magic weapon. Choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. For the duration, the weapon has a +1 bonus to attack rolls and deals an extra 1d4 damage of the chosen type when it hits.

PaladinSpells.Name: Magic Circle
PaladinSpells.Description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.

PaladinSpells.Name: Remove Curse
PaladinSpells.Description: You touch an object or a creature. If it is cursed, any curse affecting it is ended.

PaladinSpells.Name: Revivify
PaladinSpells.Description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point.

PaladinSpells.Name: Aura of Life
PaladinSpells.Description: A life-affirming energy surrounds you, protecting your allies. Each non-hostile creature in the aura gains resistance to necrotic damage and cannot have its hit points reduced below 1.

PaladinSpells.Name: Aura of Purity
PaladinSpells.Description: The air shimmers with holy energy in a 30-foot radius around you. Affected creatures have advantage on saving throws against disease, poison, and the frightened condition.

PaladinSpells.Name: Aura of the Guardian
PaladinSpells.Description: When a creature within 10 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to magically take that damage instead.

PaladinSpells.Name: Banishment
PaladinSpells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished.

PaladinSpells.Name: Death Ward
PaladinSpells.Description: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death. The first time the target would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, the target instead drops to 1 hit point and the spell ends.

PaladinSpells.Name: Locate Creature
PaladinSpells.Description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the creature's location as long as that creature is within 1,000 feet of you.

PaladinSpells.Name: Staggering Smite
PaladinSpells.Description: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon flares with force, and the attack deals an extra 4d6 force damage.

PaladinSpells.Name: Banishing Smite
PaladinSpells.Description: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack before this spell ends, your weapon crackles with force, and the attack deals an extra 5d10 force damage.

PaladinSpells.Name: Circle of Power
PaladinSpells.Description: Divine energy radiates from you, providing protection to your allies. Creatures of your choice in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PaladinSpells.Name: Destructive Wave
PaladinSpells.Description: You strike the ground with a mighty blow, creating a shockwave of energy. Each creature of your choice in a 30-foot radius must make a Constitution saving throw or take damage.

PaladinSpells.Name: Dispel Evil and Good
PaladinSpells.Description: Shimmering energy surrounds and protects you from fey, undead, and creatures originating from other planes. Choose one of these creature types, and affected creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

PaladinSpells.Name: Geas
PaladinSpells.Description: You place a magical command on a creature you can see within range, forcing it to carry out some service or refrain from some action.

PaladinSpells.Name: Raise Dead
PaladinSpells.Description: You return a dead creature you touch to life, provided that it has been dead no longer than 10 days. If the creature's soul is both willing and at liberty to rejoin the body, the creature returns to life with 1 hit point.
